In these pages, we demonstrate the various uses of the Geo-PKO dataset using R. This includes simple commands to extract information from the dataset and visualization. 

For more information on the dataset, please visit the [official homepage](https://www.pcr.uu.se/data/geo-pko/). 

Contributors to this report: 
- Nguyen Ha
- Lou van Roozendaal
- Tanushree Rao
